A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A complete sabotage to the original trilogy and even The Force Awakens.  This movie was written and directed by folks that do not understand Star Wars or care about criticism and it shows.  Star Wars lore\, concepts\, characters new and old\, and plot potential were all shamelessly destroyed in this utter troll of a movie.  Such a shame because it had all the ingredients (great cast\, great old characters/potentially great new characters\, it's freaking Star Wars!) to do something amazing.  I guess all good things come to die\, and this movie truly ruined Star Wars for me.  Disney\, I will honestly never never forgive you for this filth and have no desire to see any of your future Star Wars movies.
